relevant_findings.general: Patient appears uncomfortable and minimally communicative due to pain.
relevant_findings.GI: Severe tenderness and involuntary guarding upon palpation of RUQ.

relevant_findings.abdomen: Soft, NT/ND. RUQ incision CDI, closed with staples. Umbilical lap site CDI closed with steristrips. JP drain site CDI with gauze dressing.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Vital signs show an improvement in heart rate from 92 bpm to 68 bpm; patient is now lying comfortably.
